com.io7m.r2.core

Interface R2LightVolumeSingleReadableType

  • All Superinterfaces:
    R2LightReadableType, R2LightSingleReadableType
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    R2LightProjectiveReadableType, R2LightProjectiveType, R2LightProjectiveUsableType, R2LightProjectiveWithoutShadowReadableType, R2LightProjectiveWithoutShadowType, R2LightProjectiveWithShadowReadableType, R2LightProjectiveWithShadowType, R2LightProjectiveWithShadowVarianceType, R2LightSphericalSingleReadableType, R2LightSphericalSingleType, R2LightVolumeSingleType
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    R2LightProjectiveWithoutShadow, R2LightProjectiveWithShadowVariance, R2LightSphericalSingle

    public interface R2LightVolumeSingleReadableType
extends R2LightSingleReadableType
    The type of readable single-instance lights that operate using light volumes.

      • matchLightVolumeSingleReadable

        <A,B,E extends Throwable> B matchLightVolumeSingleReadable(A context,

                                                    throws E extends Throwable
        Match on the type of volume light.
        Type Parameters:
        A - The type of context values
        B - The type of returned values
        E - The type of raised exceptions
        Parameters:
        context - A context value
        on_projective - Evaluated for projective lights
        on_spherical - Evaluated for spherical lights
        Returns:
        A value of type B
        Throws:
        E - If any of the given functions raise E
        E extends Throwable
